ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisAppointment of JOCELYNE THERRIEN of Gatineau, Quebec, to be special adviser to the Minister of National Defence, to serve as External Monitor for the implementation of the Independent External Comprehensive Review recommendations, to hold office during pleasure for a term of one year.
